q: Senate. Bill Lockyer said many Democrats are worried about appearing to threaten voters by presenting a`` cuts only'' budget, but said voters need to know what it would mean to the state. The hit on K-12( schools) is at least close the schools six weeks a year. Voters need to hear that, he said. Earlier this month, Jerry Brown proposed a$ 127.4 Bill Lockyerion spending plan for the 2011-12 fiscal year. It includes deep cuts to higher education and services for the poor, disabled and elderly.

L'archeologo Zahi Hawass spiega sul suo sito che Notizie tristi. Cos il responsabile delle antichit egizie Zahi Hawass , spiega sul suo sito che nei giorni della rivolta sono stati rubati dal museo del Cairo 8 reperti di grande valore. Lo staff del reparto database del Museo Egizio del Cairo- scrive il capo delle antichit egiziane- mi ha consegnato la relazione sull` inventario degli oggetti al museo dopo l'incursione. Purtroppo- spiega- hanno scoperto non sono presenti nel museo alcuni reperti . Si tratta, elenca Zahi Hawass ricordando che? stata avviata un` inchiesta, di una statua in legno dorato di Tutankhamon portato da una dea e parte di un` altra del re mentre caccia con l'arpione;

Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal.`` Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. Clarence Mitchell , a former BBC News presenter, is a member of the Conservative Party in north London and also Home Secretary Theresa May says the Government will wait for the outcome of the police phone hacking investigation.. to run for the presidency is a former deputy counsel to President Ronald Reagan and former U.S. Mike Pence Jim Ryun , R-Kan. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite. the collapse of such a dictatorship was`` inevitable'' in Egypt, as well as in other countries throughout the world.`` What comes next, it's hard to predict,'' Patrick Leahy said. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now.`` The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued,`` because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
